attributes.action: Leslie Lynn, Susan Lynn and Joseph Lynn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the above wish to register our disapproval regarding the sexual orientation act due to be introduced in Northern Ireland.

rejection.details:
The title of a petition should be a call for action, not your names. There is also a very similar petition already available:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NISexOrient/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
